info.task: navigate out of end of radio group
info.title: Navigate out of the end of a radio group in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnThirdRadioButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the third radio button

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Thin crust' radio button, navigate out of the radio group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the group.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Thin crust' radio button, navigate out of the radio group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the group.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name of the group, 'Pizza Crust', is conveyed
name 'Navigate backwards from here' is conveyed
